name: Rate limit
info:
If you need more complicated condition(s) (beyond % change) to override the rate, simply add another path for the same message to reach this node.
(This is safe because the output from this node is deduped.)

label.en-US: gaps of message IDs for dedup and stats

name: logic
initialize: context.set("state", {last: new Date(), ids: [undefined], SHORT_BUCKET: Symbol("SHORT_BUCKET")})

pathObj.name: Switch Position
pathObj.remarks: Note that /ModeIsAdjustable needs to be set to 1.

pathObj.name: BMS allows battery to be charged

info:
Value	Meaning
0	Load output off
1	Automatic control / batterylife (default)
2	Alternative control 1 (off<11.1V, on>13.1V)
3	Alternative control 2 (off<11.8V, on>14.0V)
4	Always on
5	User defined settings 1 (off<Vlow, on>Vhigh)
6	User defined settings 2 (off<Vlow<on<Vhigh<off)

name: Agile $$$
info:
https://developer.octopus.energy/rest/reference

To get product:
1. call `https://api.octopus.energy/v1/accounts/A-...`
2. remove the "E-1R" and "-A" for the first placeholder and use the full tariff for the second
